channel.title: Rics NoteBook
channel.description: Studying the Art of Science & the Science of Art

item.title: Bullshitr: Ensuring Honest Conversations Between Contractors and Homeowners
item.description: Bullshitr is an innovative app designed to record and analyze conversations between mechanics or contractors and their customers. It ensures transparency, validity, and competitiveness in quotes, making the home improvement process more trustworthy and efficient.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
